content:
Hi everyone,

I would encourage you to take the survey provided at this story in Sundag: https://sundog.ucar.edu/Interact/Pages/Content/Document.aspx?id=3302.

Participation in this survey helps us to catalogue the broad range of ongoing software development and scientific application activities across NCAR, which supports our mission of ensuring that NCARâ€™s computing, modeling, and data analysis plans remain well-aligned.

Thanks

Thomas
